title: Businessweek Extra - Carlyle’s David Rubenstein
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra - Carlyle’s David Rubenstein
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring an in-depth conversation with David Rubenstein, Carlyle Group Co-Founder and Co-Chairman, about the economy, the state of private equity, and what might happen with the SALT Tax.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
